rooms.description: Art Deco-inspired entrance hall with geometric patterns and bold colors, providing natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Dedicated home office space designed in the Art Deco style with streamlined furniture, featuring a window for ample natural light.

First bedroom featuring a spacious balcony, Art Deco detailing on trimmings, and floor-to-ceiling windows for light and ventilation.
